name: Dual Blades
description: DUEL TO THE DEATH All-mighty immortal Alperen, the World's Greatest Warrior, summons all combatants past and present: 'My strength torments my soul. Slay me and deliver peace I can only know in death.' The immortal Alperen posseses the ultimate prize: The Dual Blades. The mysterious sword bestows the coveted immortality. Gain the Dual Blades or Die! Exclusive Game Boy Advance Fighter - Exploits the gaming power! Huge Characters, Awesome Graphics The most insane 'In Your Face' fighting action Gorgeous, dynamic visuals with colorful multi-scrolling arenas Intense multi-hit combos and gruesome finishing moves 2-player vs. fighting via the Game Link Cable
